meanings.definition: A pattern on clothing or equipment designed to blend in with natural surroundings.
meanings.sent1: The soldier wore camo to hide in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Hunters often wear camo to blend in with the trees.
meanings.sent3: The camo on the jacket made the hiker look like a walking bush.
meanings.sent4: Her camo outfit turned her into a chameleon among the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The camo design on the tent made it nearly invisible in the woods.

meanings.definition: To disguise or hide by blending in with surroundings.
meanings.sent1: The spy tried to camo himself in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The lizard can camo itself against the rocks.
meanings.sent3: He decided to camo his car with tree branches for fun.
meanings.sent4: She managed to camo her intentions during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The octopus can camo by changing its color to match the ocean floor.
